name: loopback-migration-tool
description: A Loopback.io tool for easy handly db migrations and seeders
author: Marcos J. Alvarez <garusis@gmail.com>

scripts.build: gulp build && git add -A && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.git-push: git push origin master --force && git push --follow-tags
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm run release
